title: OSXP? LiTe SP3 [final].iso
description:
OSXP SP3 LiTeD

This is Windows XP SP3 intergrated,  restyled in Mac OSX style !! I\&#039;ve rebuild the shell32, cause Flyakite 3.5 screwed the shell32 of Servicepack 3 !! There are several tweaks, but I\&#039;ve kept all main functions. Only the real useless things like windows tour I\&#039;ve left out this installation. The only thing that\&#039;s not working for me, is an installation into Mac Parallels.. (don\&#039;t know why..I\&#039;ve tried several versions) but gives an error at beginning of installation. I haven\&#039;t tried it in VM Ware Fusion, cause this application never worked on my hackingtosh.. But it worked fine in WM Ware Workstation in XP. So I think it\&#039;s working fine to on VM Ware fusion, but I don\&#039;t know for sure.. leave a reply when someone have tried this !

It\&#039;s configured for Multi-Processor systems with 1GB or more RAM, but\&#039;s working fine too on older PC\&#039;s. On my system it\&#039;s running like hell !! the only thing left to do after installation is to disable the prefetch funtion, (this makes booting XP very long) with WinXP manager it\&#039;s easy to fix this. (it\&#039;s included in this installation) after disabling prefetch it\&#039;s boots in 5 seconds, after 7 seconds you\&#039;re logged in as Administrator ! (Pentium 4 with 1GB RAM)
The default theme is Panther/Tiger theme (brushed) and I\&#039;ve included 32-bit high resolution ico\&#039;s too !! (system32 folder)

Have fun !!

ProtocolX
